notes.property_types: Options: land, single_family, multifamily. Remove any you don't want.
notes.neighborhoods: Add or remove neighborhoods here. Format: 'Neighborhood City ST'
notes.max_price: Max listing price in dollars. No commas.
notes.run_at: What time the scraper runs each morning. 24hr format.
notes.adding_new_neighborhoods: Just add a new line in the neighborhoods list the same way the others are written.
